title: Genesis Research Report | October 2019 | Unlocked By Lukka
content: The Block’s monthly Genesis Research Report, a compilation of the prior month's most relevant research and analysis accompanied by new insights from the research team, has been unlocked by Lukka.
The Block research team will host a conference call at 4:30 pm Eastern time / 1:30 pm Pacific time, November 21, 2019, to discuss the report. The conference call is exclusive to Genesis members.

Genesis members enjoy daily research content as well as a private Slack group with our research team and access to exclusive events such as the upcoming live recording of The Scoop with Fidelity Digital Assets' President Tom Jessop and The Block's Frank Chaparro. Today, you can enjoy our industry-leading research and analysis covering a range of forms from industry trends, market outlooks, project deep dives.
You can access the research report below:
